verses.verse: וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <WH4427> reigned יְהוֹשָׁפָ֥ט <WH3092> And Jehoshaphat בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son תַּחְתָּ֑יו <WH8478> his place וַיִּתְחַזֵּ֖ק <WH2388> in his stead and strengthened עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> himself against Israel

וַיִּ֨תֶּן־ <WH5414> And he placed חַ֔יִל <WH2428> forces בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all עָרֵ֥י <WH5892> cities יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah הַבְּצֻר֑וֹת <WH1219> in all the fenced וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> and set נְצִיבִים֙ <WH5333> garrisons בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah וּבְעָרֵ֣י <WH5892> and in the cities אֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> of Ephraim אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לָכַ֖ד <WH3920> had taken אָסָ֥א <WH609> which Asa אָבִֽיו׃ <WH1> his father

וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> become יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD עִם־ <WH5973> was with יְהוֹשָׁפָ֑ט <WH3092> was with Jehoshaphat כִּ֣י <WH3588> because הָלַ֗ךְ <WH1980> because he walked בְּדַרְכֵ֞י <WH1870> ways דָּוִ֤יד <WH1732> David אָבִיו֙ <WH1> of his father הָרִ֣אשֹׁנִ֔ים <WH7223> in the first וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and did not דָרַ֖שׁ <WH1875> and sought לַבְּעָלִֽים׃ <WH1168> not unto Baalim

כִּ֠י <WH3588> for לֵֽאלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> to the [LORD] God אָבִיו֙ <WH1> of his father דָּרָ֔שׁ <WH1875> But sought וּבְמִצְוֹתָ֖יו <WH4687> in his commandments הָלָ֑ךְ <WH1980> and walked וְלֹ֖א <WH3808> and did not כְּמַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> and not after the doings יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיָּ֨כֶן <WH3559> stablished יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Therefore the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּמְלָכָה֙ <WH4467> the kingdom בְּיָד֔וֹ <WH3027> in his hand וַיִּתְּנ֧וּ <WH5414> brought כָל־ <WH3605> and all יְהוּדָ֛ה <WH3063> and all Judah מִנְחָ֖ה <WH4503> presents לִיהוֹשָׁפָ֑ט <WH3092> to Jehoshaphat וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> had ל֥וֹ עֹֽשֶׁר־ <WH6239> and he had riches וְכָב֖וֹד <WH3519> and honour לָרֹֽב׃ <WH7230> in abundance

וַיִּגְבַּ֥הּ <WH1361> was lifted up לִבּ֖וֹ <WH3820> And his heart בְּדַרְכֵ֣י <WH1870> in the ways יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְע֗וֹד <WH5750> and again הֵסִ֛יר <WH5493> moreover he took away אֶת־ <WH853> הַבָּמ֥וֹת <WH1116> the high places וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאֲשֵׁרִ֖ים <WH842> and groves מִיהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> out of Judah פ

וּבִשְׁנַ֨ת <WH8141> year שָׁל֜וֹשׁ <WH7969> Also in the third לְמָלְכ֗וֹ <WH4427> of his reign שָׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> he sent לְשָׂרָיו֙ <WH8269> to his princes לְבֶן־ חַ֙יִל֙ <WH1134> [even] to Benhail וּלְעֹבַדְיָ֣ה <WH5662> and to Obadiah וְלִזְכַרְיָ֔ה <WH2148> and to Zechariah וְלִנְתַנְאֵ֖ל <WH5417> and to Nethaneel וּלְמִיכָיָ֑הוּ <WH4322> and to Michaiah לְלַמֵּ֖ד <WH3925> to teach בְּעָרֵ֥י <WH5892> in the cities יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

וְעִמָּהֶ֣ם <WH5973> them הַלְוִיִּ֗ם <WH3881> And with them [he sent] Levites שְֽׁמַֽעְיָ֡הוּ <WH8098> [even] Shemaiah וּנְתַנְיָ֡הוּ <WH5418> and Nethaniah וּזְבַדְיָ֡הוּ <WH2069> and Zebadiah וַעֲשָׂהאֵ֡ל <WH6214> and Asahel [וּשְׁמִרִימֹות כ] (וּשְׁמִֽירָמֹ֡ות <WH8070> Shemiramoth ק) וִֽיהוֹנָתָן֩ <WH3083> and Jehonathan וַאֲדֹ֨נִיָּ֧הוּ <WH138> and Adonijah וְטֽוֹבִיָּ֛הוּ <WH2900> and Tobijah וְט֥וֹב אֲדוֹנִיָּ֖ה <WH2899> and Tobadonijah הַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> Levites וְעִמָּהֶ֛ם <WH5973> them אֱלִישָׁמָ֥ע <WH476> and with them Elishama וִֽיהוֹרָ֖ם <WH3088> and Jehoram הַכֹּהֲנִֽים׃ <WH3548> priests

וַֽיְלַמְּדוּ֙ <WH3925> And they taught בִּֽיהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> in Judah וְעִ֨מָּהֶ֔ם <WH5973> with סֵ֖פֶר <WH5612> and [had] the book תּוֹרַ֣ת <WH8451> of the law יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיָּסֹ֙בּוּ֙ <WH5437> with them and went about בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> throughout all the cities יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah וַֽיְלַמְּד֖וּ <WH3925> and taught בָּעָֽם׃ <WH5971> the people

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <WH1961> become פַּ֣חַד <WH6343> And the fear יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD עַ֚ל <WH5921> was on כָּל־ <WH3605> all מַמְלְכ֣וֹת <WH4467> fell upon all the kingdoms הָֽאֲרָצ֔וֹת <WH776> of the lands אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which סְבִיב֣וֹת <WH5439> that [were] round about יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> Judah וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> did not נִלְחֲמ֖וּ <WH3898> so that they made no war עִם־ <WH5973> against יְהוֹשָׁפָֽט׃ <WH3092> against Jehoshaphat

וּמִן־ <WH4480> at פְּלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <WH6430> Also [some] of the Philistines מְבִיאִ֧ים <WH935> brought לִֽיהוֹשָׁפָ֛ט <WH3092> Jehoshaphat מִנְחָ֖ה <WH4503> presents וְכֶ֣סֶף <WH3701> silver מַשָּׂ֑א <WH4853> and tribute גַּ֣ם <WH1571> again הָֽעַרְבִיאִ֗ים <WH6163> and the Arabians מְבִיאִ֥ים <WH935> brought לוֹ֙ צֹ֕אן <WH6629> him flocks אֵילִ֔ים <WH352> rams שִׁבְעַ֤ת <WH7651> seven אֲלָפִים֙ <WH505> thousand וּשְׁבַ֣ע <WH7651> and seven מֵא֔וֹת <WH3967> hundred וּתְיָשִׁ֕ים <WH8495> he goats שִׁבְעַ֥ת <WH7651> and seven אֲלָפִ֖ים <WH505> thousand וּשְׁבַ֥ע <WH7651> and seven מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> hundred פ

וַיְהִ֧י <WH1961> become יְהוֹשָׁפָ֛ט <WH3092> And Jehoshaphat הֹלֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> waxed וְגָדֵ֖ל <WH1432> great עַד־ <WH5704> against לְמָ֑עְלָה <WH4605> exceedingly וַיִּ֧בֶן <WH1129> and he built בִּֽיהוּדָ֛ה <WH3063> in Judah בִּירָנִיּ֖וֹת <WH1003> castles וְעָרֵ֥י <WH5892> and cities מִסְכְּנֽוֹת׃ <WH4543> of store

וּמְלָאכָ֥ה <WH4399> business רַבָּ֛ה <WH7227> And he had much הָ֥יָה <WH1961> had ל֖וֹ בְּעָרֵ֣י <WH5892> in the cities יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah וְאַנְשֵׁ֧י <WH376> and מִלְחָמָ֛ה <WH4421> of war גִּבּ֥וֹרֵי <WH1368> mighty men חַ֖יִל <WH2428> of valour בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> [were] in Jerusalem

וְאֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> another פְקֻדָּתָ֖ם <WH6486> And these [are] the numbers לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> of them according to the house אֲבוֹתֵיהֶ֑ם <WH1> of their fathers לִֽיהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> Of Judah שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> the captains אֲלָפִ֔ים <WH505> of thousands עַדְנָ֣ה <WH5734> Adnah הַשָּׂ֔ר <WH8269> the chief וְעִמּוֹ֙ <WH5973> with גִּבּ֣וֹרֵי <WH1368> and with him mighty men חַ֔יִל <WH2428> of valour שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> three מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> thousand ס

וְעַל־ <WH5921> and יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> And next יְהוֹחָנָ֣ן <WH3076> to him [was] Jehohanan הַשָּׂ֑ר <WH8269> the captain וְעִמּ֕וֹ <WH5973> two מָאתַ֥יִם <WH3967> and with him two hundred וּשְׁמוֹנִ֖ים <WH8084> and fourscore אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> thousand ס

וְעַל־ <WH5921> and יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> And next עֲמַסְיָ֣ה <WH6007> him [was] Amasiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son זִכְרִ֔י <WH2147> of Zichri הַמִּתְנַדֵּ֖ב <WH5068> who willingly offered לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> himself unto the LORD וְעִמּ֛וֹ <WH5973> two מָאתַ֥יִם <WH3967> and with him two hundred אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand גִּבּ֥וֹר <WH1368> mighty men חָֽיִל׃ <WH2428> of valour ס

וּמִ֨ן־ <WH4480> and of בִּנְיָמִ֔ן <WH1144> And of Benjamin גִּבּ֥וֹר <WH1368> a mighty man חַ֖יִל <WH2428> of valour אֶלְיָדָ֑ע <WH450> Eliada וְעִמּ֛וֹ <WH5973> with נֹֽשְׁקֵי־ <WH5401> and with him armed men קֶ֥שֶׁת <WH7198> with bow וּמָגֵ֖ן <WH4043> and shield מָאתַ֥יִם <WH3967> two hundred אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> thousand ס

וְעַל־ <WH5921> and יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> And next יְהוֹזָבָ֑ד <WH3075> him [was] Jehozabad וְעִמּ֛וֹ <WH5973> with מֵאָֽה־ <WH3967> and with him an hundred וּשְׁמוֹנִ֥ים <WH8084> and fourscore אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand חֲלוּצֵ֥י <WH2502> ready prepared צָבָֽא׃ <WH6635> for the war ס

אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> These הַמְשָׁרְתִ֣ים <WH8334> These waited אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> on the king מִלְּבַ֞ד <WH905> apart אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> put הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> beside [those] whom the king בְּעָרֵ֥י <WH5892> cities הַמִּבְצָ֖ר <WH4013> in the fenced בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> throughout all Judah פ
